Articles.Content: I hope I'm posting in the right place. My problem is that I need a part to explode with nuke like force when it is no longer powered. I am making a anti-matter engine mod and as everyone knows anti-matter+normal matter= huge explosion. I want to make it as realistic as possible. If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated.

Look at the Interstellar Mod it's Antimatter Containment Units Explode very violently when they are discharged.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111159-BETA-1-0-4-KSP-Interstellar-Extended-1-2-6-(last-updated-1-7-2015)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111159-BETA-1-0-4-KSP-Interstellar-Extended-1-2-6-%28last-updated-1-7-2015%29)
